text: int main ( ) { int i , j , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , k , l , t = 0 , m , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & m ) ; for ( n = 0 ; n < m ; n ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & i ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { t ++ ; for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } for ( l = t ; l > 0 ; l -- ) for ( k = 0 ; k < l ; k ++ ) { if ( a [ l ] [ k + 1 ] > a [ l ] [ k ] ) { a [ l - 1 ] [ k ] = a [ l - 1 ] [ k ] + a [ l ] [ k + 1 ] ; } else { a [ l - 1 ] [ k ] = a [ l - 1 ] [ k ] + a [ l ] [ k ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
